review: Would be nice if you have more movies within the last 2 yrs as opposed to 10 yrs and older.  Overall it's great.
author: Lilet

review: It frequently goes off line during movies. Don't like that the box has a short cord and isn't wireless. You Cant search prime movies for kids without getting kid in the title.
author: susan nagy

review: I love my Amazon fire . I got mine as a gift, and am loving it. The picture quality is second to none great job.
author: Ib

review: Great service when paired with Amazon Prime or other video streaming services.Only disappointment is the number of older films requiring an additional service charge to download.Don't know if the Fire Stick works as well, but it sure beats the Google ChromeCast option for content availability.
author: J. MAYER

review: Do not buy this product if you do not reside in the US. Limited options available for customers who do not reside in the US., which is absurd because they are being advertised to the world.
author: Kelliece Mc Knight
